nodes.text: Strell House was a place at the Promenade on Nar Shaddaa named after charity worker Daegin Strell. In 3643 BBY Rylee Dray and Destris Veran picked it as the location for their new cult led by Sith Lord Kallig after splitting from a rival Cult of the Screaming Blade led by Lord Paladius.
Strell House appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor's class missions on Nar Shaddaa.
